name: Vrilles
description:
The vrilles have come to devour the Earth. Will Humanity succeed in driving these invaders away from their planet?

Follow Zephyr, Orox, and Martha, three young soldiers, in their thrilling journey through a devastated Earth, make new friends, meet powerful allies, face off against terrifying foes, and visit dozens of varied locations.

Ready your counting skills and your mouse cursor, for they will be needed in order to help our heroes make history in this tragic tale full of twists and turns.

[This game is still in development. What is available on this website is only a short demo]
